00101 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00102 
00107 
00108 double MeanSquaredError::calculateEvaluation(void)
00109 {
00110     // Control sentence 
00111 
00112    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00113    {
00114       std::cerr << std::endl
00115                 << "Flood Error: MeanSquaredError class." << std::endl
00116                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00117                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00118                 << std::endl;
00119 
00120         exit(1);
00121    }
00122    else if(inputTargetDataSet == NULL)
00123    {
00124       std::cerr << std::endl
00125                 << "Flood Error: MeanSquaredError class." << std::endl
00126                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00127                 << "Pointer to input-target data set object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00128                 << std::endl;
00129 
00130         exit(1);
00131    }
00132 
00133    // Calculate evaluation
00134 
00135    double meanSquaredError = 0.0;       
00136 
00137    // Multilayer perceptron
00138 
00139    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00140    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00141 
00142    // Input-target data set
00143 
00144    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00145    int numberOfInputVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfInputVariables();
00146    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00147 
00148    Matrix<double>& inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00149    Matrix<double>& targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00150 
00151    if(numberOfInputs != numberOfInputVariables || numberOfOutputs != numberOfTargetVariables)
00152    {
00153       std::cout << std::endl
00154                 << "Flood Error MeanSquaredError class." << std::endl 
00155                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00156                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be equal to number of input and "
00157                 << "output variables in input-target data set." << std::endl 
00158                 << std::endl;
00159 
00160       exit(1);
00161    }
00162 
00163    // Increment number of evaluations
00164 
00165    numberOfEvaluations++;
00166 
00167    double sumSquaredError = 0.0;
00168 
00169    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputs, 0.0);
00170    Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs, 0.0);
00171    Vector<double> target(numberOfOutputs, 0.0);
00172 
00173    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00174    {
00175       // Input vector
00176 
00177       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00178 
00179       // Output vector
00180 
00181       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00182 
00183       // Target vector
00184 
00185      target = targetData.getRow(sample);
00186 
00187       // Sum of squares error
00188 
00189       sumSquaredError += (output-target).dot(output-target); 
00190    }
00191 
00192    meanSquaredError = sumSquaredError/(double)numberOfSamples;
00193 
00194    return(meanSquaredError);
00195 }

00198 // Vector<double> calculateGradient(void)
00199 
00204 
00205 Vector<double> MeanSquaredError::calculateGradient(void)
00206 {
00207    // Multilayer perceptron 
00208 
00209    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00210 
00211    int numberOfHiddenLayers = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
00212    Vector<int> numbersOfHiddenNeurons = multilayerPerceptron->getNumbersOfHiddenNeurons();
00213 
00214    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00215 
00216    MultilayerPerceptron::PreAndPostProcessingMethod preAndPostProcessingMethod
00217    = multilayerPerceptron->getPreAndPostProcessingMethod();
00218 
00219    Vector<double> meanOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMeanOfOutputVariables();
00220    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getStandardDeviationOfOutputVariables();
00221 
00222    Vector<double> minimumOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMinimumOfOutputVariables();
00223    Vector<double> maximumOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMaximumOfOutputVariables();
00224 
00225    Vector<Perceptron>& outputLayer = multilayerPerceptron->getOutputLayer();
00226    Vector< Vector<Perceptron> >& hiddenLayers = multilayerPerceptron->getHiddenLayers();
00227 
00228    int numberOfNeuralParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
00229    Vector<double> synapticWeights;
00230 
00231    // Input-target data set
00232 
00233    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00234    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00235 
00236    Matrix<double>& inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00237    Matrix<double>& targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00238 
00239    Vector<double> target(numberOfTargetVariables);
00240 
00241    // Input, outputs, gradient
00242 
00243    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputs);
00244    Vector<double> inputSignal(numberOfInputs);
00245    Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00246    Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00247    Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00248    Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer(numberOfOutputs);
00249    Vector<double> outputSignal(numberOfOutputs);
00250    Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs);
00251    Vector<double> gradient(numberOfNeuralParameters, 0.0);
00252 
00253    // Output and hidden errors
00254 
00255    Vector<double> outputError(numberOfOutputs);
00256    Vector< Vector<double> > hiddenError(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00257 
00258    for(int h = 0; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00259    {
00260       hiddenError[h].setSize(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]);
00261    }
00262 
00263    // Main loop   
00264 
00265    double sum;
00266    int index;
00267 
00268    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00269    {
00270       // Actual input
00271 
00272       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00273 
00274       // Preprocess input to obtain input signal to the neural network 
00275 
00276       inputSignal = multilayerPerceptron->preprocessInput(input);
00277 
00278       // Calculate net input output and output signal derivative from all hidden layers
00279 
00280       netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0] 
00281       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
00282 
00283       outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[0] 
00284       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
00285 
00286       outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[0] 
00287       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
00288   
00289       for(int h = 1; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00290       {
00291          netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00292          ->calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(h, outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h-1]);
00293    
00294          outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00295          ->calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(h, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h]);
00296 
00297          outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00298          ->calculateOutputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(h, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h]);         
00299       }
00300 
00301       // Get net input signal to output layer
00302 
00303       netInputSignalToOutputLayer = multilayerPerceptron
00304       ->calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
00305 
00306       // Get actual output signal from output layer
00307 
00308       Vector<double> outputSignal = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
00309 
00310       // Get actual output signal derivative from output layer
00311 
00312       Vector<double> outputSignalDerivative
00313       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalDerivative(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
00314 
00315       // Postprocess output signal from the neural network to get output
00316 
00317       Vector<double> output = multilayerPerceptron->postprocessOutputSignal(outputSignal);
00318 
00319       // Actual target
00320 
00321       Vector<double> target = targetData.getRow(sample);
00322 
00323       // Evaluate the error for all the output units
00324       
00325       switch(preAndPostProcessingMethod)
00326       {
00327          case MultilayerPerceptron::None:
00328          { 
00329             outputError = outputSignalDerivative*2.0*(output - target)/(double)numberOfSamples;
00330          }
00331          break;
00332 
00333          case MultilayerPerceptron::MeanAndStandardDeviation:
00334          {
00335                outputError = outputSignalDerivative*2.0*(output-target)
00336                             *standardDeviationOfOutputVariables/(double)numberOfSamples;
00337          }                      
00338          break;
00339 
00340          case MultilayerPerceptron::MinimumAndMaximum:
00341          {
00342                outputError = outputSignalDerivative*2.0*(output-target)*0.5
00343                *(maximumOfOutputVariables-minimumOfOutputVariables)/(double)numberOfSamples;
00344          }
00345          break;
00346       }           
00347 
00348       // Backpropagate the output errors to obtain the hidden errors
00349 
00350       // Last hidden layer
00351 
00352       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]; j++)
00353       {
00354          sum = 0.0;
00355 
00356          for(int k = 0; k < numberOfOutputs; k++)
00357          {
00358             synapticWeights = outputLayer[k].getSynapticWeights();
00359             sum += (synapticWeights[j])*outputError[k];
00360          }
00361 
00362          hiddenError[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][j] = outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][j]*sum;
00363       }
00364 
00365       // Rest of hidden layers
00366 
00367       for(int h = numberOfHiddenLayers-2; h >= 0; h--) 
00368       {   
00369          for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]; j++)
00370          {
00371             sum = 0.0;
00372 
00373             for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h+1]; k++)
00374             {
00375                synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[h+1][k].getSynapticWeights();
00376                sum += (synapticWeights[j])*hiddenError[h+1][k];
00377             }            
00378           
00379             hiddenError[h][j] = outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[h][j]*sum;
00380          }
00381       }
00382 
00383       // Calculate gradient elements
00384 
00385       index = 0;
00386 
00387       // Calculate gradient elements of hidden neurons
00388 
00389       // First hidden layer
00390 
00391       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[0]; j++)
00392       {
00393          // Bias
00394 
00395          gradient[index] += hiddenError[0][j];
00396          index++;
00397 
00398          // Synaptic weights
00399 
00400          synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[0][j].getSynapticWeights();
00401 
00402          for(int k = 0; k < numberOfInputs; k++)
00403          {
00404             gradient[index] += hiddenError[0][j]*inputSignal[k];
00405             index++;   
00406          }
00407       }
00408 
00409       // Rest of hidden layers  
00410     
00411       for(int h = 1; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00412       {      
00413          for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]; j++)
00414          {
00415             // Bias
00416 
00417             gradient[index] += hiddenError[h][j];
00418             index++;
00419 
00420             // Synaptic weights
00421 
00422             synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[h][j].getSynapticWeights();
00423 
00424             for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h-1]; k++)
00425             {
00426                gradient[index] += hiddenError[h][j]*outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h-1][k];
00427                index++;   
00428             }
00429          }
00430       }
00431 
00432       // Calculate gradient elements of output neurons
00433 
00434       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfOutputs; j++)
00435       {
00436          // Bias
00437 
00438          gradient[index] += outputError[j];
00439          index++;
00440 
00441          // Synaptic weights
00442 
00443          for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]; k++)
00444          {
00445             gradient[index] += outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][k]*outputError[j];
00446             index++;
00447          }
00448       }
00449    }
00450 
00451    return(gradient);
00452 }

00455 // void saveInputTargetAndOutput(char*) method
00456 
00467 
00468 void MeanSquaredError::saveInputTargetAndOutput(char* filename)
00469 {
00470    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00471 
00472    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00473    int numberOfInputVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfInputVariables();
00474    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00475 
00476    Matrix<double> inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00477    Matrix<double> targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00478 
00479    Matrix<double> outputData(numberOfSamples, numberOfOutputs, 0.0);
00480 
00481    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputVariables, 0.0);
00482    Vector<double> output(numberOfTargetVariables, 0.0);
00483 
00484    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00485    {
00486       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00487 
00488       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00489 
00490       outputData.setRow(sample, output);
00491    }
00492 
00493    std::fstream file;
00494 
00495    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00496 
00497    // Control sentence
00498 
00499    if(!file.is_open())
00500    {
00501       std::cout << std::endl
00502                 << "Flood Error MeanSquaredError class." << std::endl
00503                 << "void saveInputTargetAndOutput(char*) method." << std::endl
00504                 << "Cannot open input-target-output data file." << std::endl
00505                 << std::endl;
00506 
00507       exit(1);
00508    }
00509    else
00510    {
00511       if(display)
00512      {
00513          std::cout << std::endl
00514                    << "Saving input-target-output to data file..."
00515                    << std::endl;
00516      }
00517    }
00518 
00519    // Write file header
00520 
00521    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Input-target-output data file." << std::endl
00522         << "% 1 - Input data" << std::endl
00523         << "% 2 - Target data" << std::endl
00524         << "% 3 - Output data" << std::endl
00525         << std::endl;
00526 
00527    // Write file data
00528 
00529    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00530    {
00531       // Write sample input data
00532 
00533       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputVariables; i++)
00534       {
00535          file << inputData[sample][i] << " ";
00536       }
00537 
00538       // Write sample target data
00539 
00540       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfTargetVariables; i++)
00541       {
00542          file << targetData[sample][i] << " ";
00543       }
00544 
00545       // Write sample output data
00546 
00547       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
00548       {
00549          file << outputData[sample][i] << " ";
00550       }
00551 
00552       file << std::endl;
00553    }
00554 
00555    file << std::endl;
00556 
00557    file.close();
00558 }
